name: The Sorrow of Silk
description:
The Sorrow of Silk is an atmospheric, 3D platformer game, created in two weeks for Buddy Up Jam: Winter 2023 (theme: "Soft").

You are a college student going through a dark time in your life. The world is asking a lot of you and all you want to do is sleep...

Maybe things will work themselves out overnight in your dreams.

This game contains references to topics such as depression and suicide which some players may find distressing.

CW: negative self-talk, depression, suicidal ideation, insects, spiders

"Arachnaphobia" mode and "More Trigger Friendly" mode (less negative messages) are available in the settings.

WASD - Move
E - Interact
Space - Jump
Space while in air - Double Jump
Escape - Pause Menu

If all you see is a grey screen, the game may be loading. Please give it some time! :)
